attributes.action: Prevent the FA from awarding Sky the England national teams games.
attributes.background: I find it absolutely disgusting that Sky have been awarded the England footballs teams games for the nations league I believe that anybody should be able to watch their own country play a sport. I’m petitioning for future competitions be only offered to freeview channels so everybody can watch.

rejection.details:
This is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the FA.

You could start a new petition calling for the list of sporting events which have to be shown on free-to-air terrestrial television to be changed to include all England games in the Nations League if that is something you would like to see happen.
